description: This file contains the MainActivity class for an Android app, which serves as the entry point and immediately forwards to the NotesListActivity screen upon creation.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that acts as the entry point of the app, redirecting users to the Notes list.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle callback invoked when the activity is created; it starts the NotesListActivity and finishes itself.
